name: Ninja Remix
description: This is an updated version of Last Ninja 2: Back With a Vengeance. The differences are a short intro, some minor graphic changes and a remixed soundtrack. Gameplay is exactly the same as in Last Ninja 2.

shot.caption:
Cinematics:
Master Armakuni is being teleported to an unknown location, baffling his Shadow Warriors students during a training session.

Cinematics:
Armakuni wonders how inoffensive the city looks alike from this distance. The code of the true Shadow Warriors must not perish to evil...

Level 1, "The Park": Starting point... not quite.
After triggering the secret mechanism for the stage elevator.

Level 1, "The Park": Backstage.
- Please Mr. Armakuni, just one more screenshot and we got the Park scene... for the CPC...
- This is absurd, I'm out of here!

Level 1, "The Park": The Joggler.
- Man, you look pale...why don't you instead of throwing me that ugly looking things, tell me where can I find a nice B??

Level 1, "The Park": Shuriken.
- Can you imagine... a ZX81 in the trash... these guys...

Level 1, "The Park": Toilets and weapons.
- ...I swear I was not peeking on your wife, you see... the kids not only hid but broke in two pieces my Nun...
(POW!)

Level 1, "The Park": One Jump.
One jump to enter the streets.
